mapper.select: select column_name as name, column_comment as comment, data_type as type, (case when column_key = 'PRI' then 1 else 0 end) as is_pk, (case when extra = 'auto_increment' then 1 else 0 end) as is_increment, (case when (is_nullable = 'no' && column_key != 'PRI' && column_default is null) then 1 else 0 end) as is_required, (case when column_key = 'UNI' then 1 else 0 end) as is_unique, ordinal_position as sort from information_schema.columns where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = (#{tableName}) order by ordinal_position
